alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 15 at 10:08AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...TSUNAMI ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FOR ALL COASTAL LOCATIONS IN NORTHWEST CALIFORNIA... ...TSUNAMI ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FOR ALL COASTAL LOCATIONS IN NORTHWEST CALIFORNIA... * LOCAL IMPACTS... A TSUNAMI CAPABLE OF PRODUCING STRONG CURRENTS THAT MAY BE HAZARDOUS TO SWIMMERS...BOATS...AND COASTAL STRUCTURES IS OCCURRING. WIDESPREAD INUNDATION IS NOT EXPECTED. * RECOMMENDED ACTIONS... IF YOU ARE LOCATED IN THIS COASTAL AREA...MOVE OFF THE BEACH AND OUT OF HARBORS AND MARINAS. DO NOT GO TO THE COAST TO WATCH THE TSUNAMI. BE ALERT TO INSTRUCTIONS FROM YOUR LOCAL EMERGENCY OFFICIALS * FORECAST TSUNAMI START TIMES...A TSUNAMI SURGE IS ONGOING ALONG THE COAST OF NORTHERN CALIFORNIA. TSUNAMIS OFTEN ARRIVE AS A SERIES OF WAVES OR SURGES WHICH COULD BE DANGEROUS FOR MANY HOURS AFTER THE FIRST WAVE ARRIVAL. THE FIRST TSUNAMI WAVE OR SURGE MAY NOT BE THE HIGHEST IN THE SERIES. * FORECAST TSUNAMI DURATION...HAZARDOUS CURRENTS AND WAVES WILL REMAIN POSSIBLE DURING MUCH OF SATURDAY. * PRELIMINARY EARTHQUAKE INFORMATION... A VOLCANIC ERUPTION OCCURRED AT 827 PM PST ON JAN 14 2022 IN THE SOUTH PACIFIC OCEAN. A TSUNAMI WAS GENERATED WITH THE ERUPTION. THIS PRODUCT WILL BE UPDATED AS NEW INFORMATION BECOMES AVAILABLE. STAY TUNED TO YOUR LOCAL NEWS SOURCE AND NOAA WEATHER RADIO FOR FURTHER INFORMATION AND UPDATES.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southwestern Humboldt
